description.value:
School conjuration (healing) [good]; Level bloodrager 4, cleric/oracle 4, magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner 4, unchained Summoner 4, witch 4;

Casting Time 1 round
Components V, S, M (1 drop of blood from a good outsider or 1 dose of holy water)

Range touch
Targets creature touched
Duration 1 round/2 levels
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless);  Spell Resistance yes

Description

As per @Compendium[pf1.spells.6d6bgiakwmwiu7qv]{celestial healing}, except the target gains fast healing 4 and the target radiates the aura of a good cleric.

materials.value: 1 drop of blood from a good outsider or 1 dose of holy water
